Magnum's wrath was seething then, a volcanic fire about to spill. He
had no=
 idea what Megatron was doing here, but that sure didn't sound
like him. Th=
at was enough for him.

Magnum: You said the same thing in the past. Saying=
 you're right
doesn't mean you are. I know that about you, buckethead. Why =
would it
be different this time? Why shouldn't I send you back to the Matri=
x
limb by limb?

Deadfur was fidgety, in his corner. He didn't dare to inte=
rvene
between the two colossus, but he knew who would.

Deadfur: Razorwing,=
 you copy? Do something before they blow the whole
city down into the lake!=
